response.original_title: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood: Best of Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood - Recipe for Fun Collection
response.overview: Let's all go to Baker Aker's Bakery! Join Daniel Tiger as he picks out a cake for his birthday party with the help of his mom, goes to the bakery with Prince Wednesday to make cookies for the Neighborhood, and learns how to make delicious banana bread from Baker Aker.
response.title: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood: Best of Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood - Recipe for Fun Collection
